divs: Sighting DetailsI have to admit that the recent UFO sightings have got pretty paranoid. Tonight though, I calmed down a bit and realized that it's all in my head. I decided maybe I should take a look at the sky outside anyways. My wife and I went out to deck in the back. We gazed at the stars for a while. There was nothing out of the ordinary. For a while we were just trying to find some constellations. Then, out of nowhere I see a shooting star in the sky. It had me pretty excited. I even made a wish. (HAHA) It moved quickly. I lost my sight of it from the trees. Eventually, my wife got cold so we went inside. I browsed the web for a while and listened to some music. Then I realized something about what I saw, it wasn't a shooting star at all. It was too close to us. The color was bright orange. Almost like fireball falling from the sky. It looked similar to videos on the web. I just realized that I should have seen a glimpse of it when it went behind the trees but i didn't. As if it just disappeared. It just seem weird now that I'm thinking about it. I didn't get a video or picture. Didn't think that I would see anything. Maybe it was really a shooting star? Maybe it'll happen again so I can decide. Bye.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Little Ferry
This sighting has never been favorited.
